On the Arts Trail

Amy Milka discovers York's cultural side.

The insider's introduction to York's prolific Drama Society

York DramaSoc is one of the largest and most active societies at the University, with over 400 members. We are an incredibly prolific society and our output is one of the highest of any drama society in the country.

Sweet Charity

Following last year's hit performance of West Side Story, the Central Hall Musical Society have announced their next production, which will be the hit Broadway show Sweet Charity.
